title: Kan Lalpa thlamuanna
lyrics:
Kan Lalpa thlamuanna,
Luipui lian angin,
Ropuiin a luang a,
Pung telh telh fovin.

Ni tin a pung zel thin,
Thuk deuh deuh pawhin;
Kan rilru zawng zawng nen,
Min luan him fo thin.

Jehova ring nghetin,
A malsawm kan dawng;
A thutiam ang zelin,
Thlamuanin kan awm.

Pathian kutphah chhungah,
Him takin kan awm;
Kan hmelmate pawhin,
Min zui ngam lo hlawm.
Hrehawm te, thlaphan te;
Lungngaihte pawhin,
A kutphaha awmte,
An tawk thei lo thin.

Thil hrehawm leh lawmawm,
Pathianin a tir;
Min tithianghlim turin,
Khawngaihin a tir,
That hlir min vur turin,
Amah kan ring ang;
Beisei bo tawp lovin,
Min awmtir fo vang.
